results.title: Dead Halfling
results.text: The bloated corpse of a dead halfling is riddled with arrows and is tangling from a tree vine. (They trespassed on grung sacred ground.)

results.title: Humanoid Bones
results.text: The humanoid is unarmored and lashed to a tree with vines. (The Batiri goblins doused them in honey and left them to the insects.)

results.title: Crushed Dwarf
results.text: The crushed remains of an unarmored dwarf shows signs of being trampled by a dinosaur.

results.title: Charred Humanoid Bones
results.text: The bones are charred and have been gnawed on. (They were murdered and cannibalized by starving companions.)

results.title: Mangled Half-Elf
results.text: The mangled body of a half-elf appears to be bludegoned to death. (They were dropped from a height by pterafolk.)

results.title: Scattered Dwarf Bones
results.text: The scattered bones of a dwarf who was torn to pieces before being devoured. (Velociraptors got them.)

results.title: Purple Elvin Corpse
results.text: They died only a few days ago from a poisonous snake bite.

results.title: Human Corpse in Tree
results.text: The fresh corspe is stuffed in a hollow tree. (Girillions plan to return later and eat it.)

results.title: Sitting Skeleton
results.text: A humanoid skeleton is seated on a folding chair clutching a fork and knife.

results.title: Cocooned Gnome
results.text: The desiccated husk of a gnome is cocooned in spider webs.

results.title: Half Body of a Human
results.text: The body of a human from the waist up only. There are signs that the explorer crawled a distance before dying. They were bitten in half by a t-rex. (They have a charter which identifies them as Lord Onoivan IV of Dales.)

results.title: Charred Elven Skeleton
results.text: The charred skeleton is inside a charred constrictor snake. (Both were killed by a Lightning Bolt.)

results.title: Rotting Frog
results.text: The rotting body of a giant frog with a shortsword poking out it. (If the frog is cut open a partially digested halfling is inside.)

results.title: Taxabi Mess
results.text: A tabaxi spread eagle on the ground, but with its limbs and head severed and crudely stitched back on in the wrong arrangement.

results.title: Spiked Half-Orc
results.text: A half-orc is spiked to an enormous tree by a broken off tirceratops horn.

results.title: Spit Roasted Gnome
results.text: A gnome is spitted over a burned out firepit. They are overcooked and not eaten. (Goblin tools and velocirator tracks are abound.)

results.title: Headless Human
results.text: A headless humanoid is hung upside down from a tree. Six Batiri goblins spears are thrust through the body. (It was a Red Wizard judging fom the robes.)

results.title: Elf in a Tree
results.text: An elf is balanced on a large tree trunk. (An attached note says they were hiding from an Allosaurus and were too afraid to come down.)

results.title: Smoldering Remains of a Human
results.text: The remains have a Flaming Fist style helmet and its legs are broken. (He succummed to a faeire dragon's euphoria breath weapon and stepped off a cliff. A companion tried to carry them back but they died.)

results.title: Holy Dwarf
results.text: A dwarf with 6 large holes piercing their armor and chest. (They were hit by a stegasaurus tail.)
